introduction.name: Sanghoon Jun
introduction.title: Programmer, Engineer, Analyist, and Producer.
introduction.summary: I'm enjoying all the moments of the technical challenges and successful deliveries of marketable products. I love to cooperate with domain experts from various field. For producing high quality software product in a short-time, I've worked and been learning diverse aspect of engineering, including data science, machine learning, and web/mobile technologies

highlight.title: Product-Oriented
highlight.description: Deliver trustful working product, love to expand and upgrade it

highlight.title: Technical Coverage
highlight.description: Capable of making end-to-end solution from the scratch to production

highlight.title: Fast Learner
highlight.description: Fast follow-up and quick implementation with strong R&D skills

highlight.title: Data Miner
highlight.description: Focus on data, analyze them, build a model, and make data-driven decision

education.degree: M.S. in Electronics, Electrical and Computer Engineering
Ph.D. in Electronics, Electrical and Computer Engineering

work_experience.summary: Led a back-end team and machine learning TF in the startup company. Developed cloud-based systems for supporting the mobile application of 100k daily active users and Improved core algorithms of the service using machine learning technologies.
achievements: Improved an existing face tracking engine of the company by applying deep learning, data augmentations, and predictive programming and sold its SDK to application and hardware companies
Developed the contents management system and content delivery service for the mobile application
Designed and launched server-less services for 100k DAU without any server failure

work_experience.summary: Managed computer-aided diagnosis team of a research laboratory and related projects focused on developing disease quantification and similar disease case retrieval system for clinical support.
achievements: Analyzed mechanism and implemented classifications of lung diseases using deep learning algorithm with +5% improvement(91% to 96%, in comparison with shallow machine learning algorithm) in pattern classification
Designed and implemented content-based retrieval system using image pattern recognition and machine learning
Contributed to the enhancement of technologies for imaging, segmentation, and prediction by applying machine learning techniques to brain, colon, kidney, heart, and lung diseases

work_experience.summary: Designed, conducted, and completed research on the development of music information retrieval systems as well as music recommendation systems. Studies cover the areas of audio signal processing, large scale information analytics, and machine learning.
achievements: Developed cover song identification and similar song retrieval system having 85% accuracy of genre- based search
Designed and developed content-based music recommendation system based on user emotion and preferences having 84% user satisfaction score
Designed and developed collaborative music recommendation system based on social relations and trends after analyzing 4.6 million tweets

Designed and developed context-aware music recommendation system imitating radio broadcast song selection and registered a jointly owned patent with NAVER Cooperation which is Korean top internet company
Designed and implemented geographical music preference visualization scheme Signal Processing and Content Analysis
Designed and implemented methods for efficient representation of complex music audio signals
music mood sequence generation improving music matching accuracy by +14%(70% to 84%, in comparison with segment-based approach) and music structure analysis having 72% segmentation accuracy
Designed and implemented a music emotion recognition scheme using the fuzzy inference technique achieving 12% error rate between user and recognized emotion state
